name: Deck Hunter
summary: Deck Hunter is a roguelike card game. The World of Klanojh has been cursed by Glatta, the Goddess of Anger. Build your deck, make combos, defeat fantasy creatures and help Avery to face the evil and restore the balance!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: DBG
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2019年5月30日
  • 售价: ￥50
  • 开发商: L_Draven
  • 发行: L_Draven
